title: Summon Swarm
data:
{{obsolete}} {{NISpell |name=Summon Swarm |level=5 |school1={{Summonings}} |school2= |school3= |sources=
*[[Rod of the swarm]]
}} {{flavour|This spell summons forth a pestilential swarm.}} '''Summon Swarm''' is a level 5 [[Summonings]] spell which summons a swarm of 1 - 8 friendly monsters. [[Spell power]] augments the number of monsters summoned and their duration, but has no impact on the composition of the swarm. Since this is a [[rod]]-based spell, spell power is based on your [[Evocations]] skill, not Summonings. Possible summons include: *{{monsterlink|Worker ant}} (25%) *{{monsterlink|Killer bee}} (25%) *{{monsterlink|Spider}} (16.7%) *{{monsterlink|Scorpion}} (8%) *{{monsterlink|Worm}} (8%) *{{monsterlink|Vampire mosquito}} (8%*) *{{monsterlink|Wasp}} (8%) *{{monsterlink|Butterfly}} (8%) [*] Worshipers of [[good gods]] will never summon [[vampire mosquito]]s. ==History== In [[0.18]], [[rod of the swarm]] was removed and so was Summon Swarm Summon Swarm could summon [[goliath beetle]]s prior to their removal in [[0.17]]. Summon Swarm used to be capable of summoning [[wolf spider]]s as well. When wolf spiders were improved in [[0.11]], this spell was nerfed to only be capable of summoning regular spiders.
